text: Nice church building outside n inside church sanctuary! Pass by for quick Sun tradition service n hva few pews seats available. Welcome corner was nice as enquire for Christmas event

Enjoyed the nice architecture and environment when attending a wedding there. Comfortable with air-conditioning too for hot weather. There is a live streaming and projecting on screens for people seated far away from the altar.
( All photo credits @KAI_PICTURE )

Wesley Methodist Church is a historical Christian church by Methodist denomination in Singapore. They have weekly Sunday service at 7.30 am, 9.30 am, 11.30am and 5.00pm in English. While, Mandarin service is at 2.30 pm and Filipino service at 2 pm.

Wesley Methodist Church can be accessed by walking from Dhoby Ghaut, Bras Basah and Bencoolen MRT station.

we came here for a wedding! the architecture of this place was beautiful and there was nice air-conditioning to keep cool in the weather. there were many nice plants to accompany the beautiful view from this church as well.

Wesley gives me such a sense of peace and feeling of home whenever I attend onsite services. Rather than online, going in person is a world of difference. Pastor Ray's call to come home for Christmas is especially apt for the season üòç
